data.fullContent: Five-card draw (also known as a Cantrell draw) is a poker variant that is considered the simplest variant of poker, and is the basis for video poker. As a result, it is often the first variant learned by new players. It is commonly played in home games but rarely played in casino and tournament play. The variant is also offered by some online venues, although it is not as popular as other variants such as Seven-card stud and Texas hold 'em.
data.answer: 五卡抽法(也称为Cantrell抽法)是扑克的一种变体，被认为是扑克的最简单变体，也是视频扑克的基础。因此，它通常是新玩家学到的第一个变体。它通常在主场比赛中进行，但很少在赌场和锦标赛中进行。这种变体也由一些在线场所提供，尽管它不像其他变体如七张牌索哈和德州扑克他们那样受欢迎。
